analysis.key_quote: I am deeply alarmed by any proposal to reclassify civil servants—such as the revival of Schedule F—because it fundamentally threatens the nonpartisan nature of the federal workforce.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed reclassification under Schedule F, emphasizing the importance of a merit-based civil service and the dangers of politicization, which aligns with concerns about the integrity and independence of federal employees.
